dsc28034.description: The DSC28034 is the HX2000 32-bit DSP with 96 MHz, 256 KB Flash.

OAR.description: 000h-3FFh Bits 9-0 provide the 10-bit slave address of the I2C module

ARBL.description: Arbitration-lost Interrupt Flag Bit (only Applicable when the I2C Module is a Master-transmitter)

ARDY.description: Register-access-ready Interrupt Flag Bit (only Applicable when the I2C Module is in the Master Mode)

SAR.description: 000h-3FFh Bits 9-0 Provide the 10-bit Slave Address that the I2C Module Transmits when it is in the Master Transmitter Mode

RM.description: Repeat Mode Bit (only Applicable when the I2C Module is a Master-transmitter)

STP.description: STOP Condition Bit (only Applicable when the I2C Module is a Master)

STT.description: START Condition Bit (only Applicable when the I2C Module is a Master)

FREE.description: This Bit Controls the Action Taken by the I2C Module when a Debugger Breakpoint is Encountered

TXFFST.description: Contains the Status of the Transmit FIFO

RXFFINTCLR.description: Receive FIFO Interrupt Flag Clear Bit

RXFFST.description: Contains the Status of the Receive FIFO

SRES.description: This Bit Can only Be Written and Always Reads as Zero

SAM.description: Set Number of Samples Used by CAN Module to Determine the Actual Evaluation Level of CAN Bus

GIL.description: Global Interrupt Level of Interrupt TCOF, WDIF, WUIF, BOIF, EPIF, RMLIF, AAIF and WLIF

TXFUNC.description: Must be Set for CAN Module Functionality

RXFUNC.description: Must be Set for CAN Module Functionality

CANMDH0.description: Message Data High-level Register for DBO = 0

CANMDL1.description: Message Data Insufficience Register for DBO = 1

CANMDH1.description: Message Data High-level Register for DBO = 1

LAM[280].description: Enable Masking of any Identifier Bits of Incoming Message

STOP.description: Number of Stop Bits of SCI

CLK_MASTER.description: SCI Internal Clock Enabled or LIN Master / Slave

SETTOA3WUSINT.description: Set 3 Times Wake up Timeout Interrupt

SETISFEINT.description: Set Inconsistent Synchronization Field Error Interrupt

SETPBEINT.description: Set Physical Bus Error (PBE ERROR) Interrupt

CLRTOA3WUSINT.description: Clear 3 Times Wake up Timeout Interrupt

CLRISFEINT.description: Clear Iconsistent Synchronization Field Error Interrupt

SETTOAWUSINTLVL.description: Set Wake up Timeout Interrupt Level

SETTOA3WUSINTLVL.description: Set 3 Times Wake up Timeout Interrupt Level

SETNREINTLVL.description: Set no Response Error Interrupt Level

SETISFEINTLVL.description: Set Iconsistent Synchronization Field Error Interrupt Level

SETPBEINTLVL.description: Set Physical Bus Error Interrupt Level

CLRTOAWUSINTLVL.description: Clear Wake up Timeout Interrupt Level

CLRNREINTLVL.description: Clear no Response Error Interrupt Level

CLRISFEINTLVL.description: Clear Iconsistent Synchronization Field Error Interrupt Level

CLRPBEINTLVL.description: Clear Physical Bus Error Interrupt Level

M.description: Selection of SCI/LIN4 Bit Score Distributor

RXPENA.description: Module Analog Return Loop is Enabled by Receiving Pin

ISFERRENA.description: Inconsistent Synchronization Fields Error Enable Bit
